alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 20 at 2:27AM MST until December 22 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 7 inches. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains, Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains, Helena Valley and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from Noon today to 11 AM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 AM Wednesday to 6 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
